194{

207bool VolumeKernel::isPointInside(long id, double x, double y, double z) const
208{

211
219ConstProxyVector<long> VolumeKernel::getFaceOrderedVertexIds(const Cell &cell, int face) const
220{
221 ConstProxyVector<long> faceVertexIds = cell.getFaceVertexIds(face);
222 if (areFaceVerticesOrdered(cell, face)) {
223 return faceVertexIds;
224 }
225
226 std::size_t nFaceVertices = faceVertexIds.size();
227 ConstProxyVector<long> orderedFaceVertexIds(ConstProxyVector<long>::INTERNAL_STORAGE, nFaceVertices);
228 ConstProxyVector<long>::storage_pointer orderedFaceVertexIdsStorage = orderedFaceVertexIds.storedData();
229 for (std::size_t k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
230 int vertex = getFaceOrderedLocalVertex(cell, face, k);
231 orderedFaceVertexIdsStorage[k] = faceVertexIds[vertex];
232 }
233
234 return orderedFaceVertexIds;
235}
236
245bool VolumeKernel::areFaceVerticesOrdered(const Cell &cell, int face) const
246{
247 // Early return for low-dimension elements
248 if (getDimension() <= 2) {
249 return true;
250 }
251
252 // Check if vertices are ordered
253 ElementType faceType = cell.getFaceType(face);
254 switch (faceType) {
255
256 case (ElementType::POLYGON):
257 {
258 return true;
259 }
260
261 default:
262 {
263 assert(faceType != ElementType::UNDEFINED);
264 const Reference2DElementInfo &faceInfo = static_cast<const Reference2DElementInfo &>(ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(faceType));
265 return faceInfo.areVerticesCCWOrdered();
266 }
267
268 }
269}
270
281int VolumeKernel::getFaceOrderedLocalVertex(const Cell &cell, int face, std::size_t n) const
282{
283 // Early return for low-dimension elements
284 if (getDimension() <= 2) {
285 return n;
286 }
287
288 // Get the request index
289 ElementType faceType = cell.getFaceType(face);
290 switch (faceType) {
291
292 case (ElementType::POLYGON):
293 {
294 return n;
295 }
296
297 default:
298 {
299 assert(faceType != ElementType::UNDEFINED);
300 const Reference2DElementInfo &faceInfo = static_cast<const Reference2DElementInfo &>(ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(faceType));
301 return faceInfo.getCCWOrderedVertex(n);
302 }
303
304 }
305}
306
